item.description:
﻿ 

Come join Tom Ferrara for an entertaining evening of acousticguitar music in an intimate cafe atmosphere. This is Tom's debut performance at Cafe Atlantique and will be playing from 6:30 until 9:30 PM. To complement the cafe ambiance, Tom will use both 6 and12-string guitars and feature a mellow mix of acoustic classics from Simon & Garfunkle, Cat Stevens, Howie Day, The Beatles and more.As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring a friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier!

 

Tom Ferrara is a member of Party Express! and will be your event host. Tom performs a classic selection of acoustic folk and mellow rock that includes a varied mix of artists from James Taylor, Jim Croce and The Beatles to Green Day and Collective Soul. Tom hass performed a number of happy hours, open mic nights, private parties, benefits and festivals. For more, check out Tom at: http://www.facebook.com/TheCaptainRocks. 

Cafe Atlantique is a European style cafe that offers a great selection of coffee, tea, paninis, salads, soups, and crepes, as well as wine and beer. Indoor and outdoor seating.  Live music, free wifi & weekly drink specials. You can find out more about Cafe Atlantique by visitng their Facebook page at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Cafe-Atlantique/48606855845. Also, here's a link to YELP! with soem reviews, etc. http://www.yelp.com/biz/cafe-atlantique-milford.

 

Please note that at Cafe Atlantique tips will be greatly appreciated!

 

NOTE: If the weather is aprticularly nice - I MAY setup on the patio behind the cafe.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: An Evening of Music at the Cafe!
